attributes.action: get rugby into the 2012 London Olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the eyes of the world having recently been on Beijing, it makes one wonder just what kind of exposure and growth could be achieved if Rugby were on display. Having the top players of your country having a crack at Gold would be fantastic. The IRB are calling out to all players and supporters to spread the message that Rugby needs to be re-included in the Olympic movement, with Sevens being perfectly suited to it.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "get rugby into the 2012 London Olympics."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18769


Prime Minister's Office
